mapper.select:
select
from system_event order by event_trigger_time desc limit #{limit, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{size, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into system_event (system_event_id, event_trigger_time, event_type, event_desc) values (#{systemEventId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eventTriggerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{eventType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eventDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
